sentences.en: I hate to interject a note of realism, but we don't have any money to do any of this.
sentences.cn: 我不想插话讲实际情况, 但我们确实没钱做这些事.

sentences.en: If I may interject a note of caution into the discussion.
sentences.cn: 请容我在讨论中插句话,要注意.

sentences.en: Then it has to choose the best mode and time to interject.
sentences.cn: 最后,它还必须选择最佳的打扰模式与时机.

sentences.en: To introduce or interject ( a comment, for example ) during discourse or a conversation.
sentences.cn: 插话在交谈或谈话中添入或插入 ( 例如,评论 )

sentences.en: Well, if I could just interject.

words.tran_cn: [语] 感叹词；插入语；突然的发声

trans.tran_en: to interrupt what someone else is saying with a sudden remark
